item.title: सविता
item.description: savitR SunEarthGravityGrid सविता प्रचोदकः। सहस्रगायत्रीजपे देवः सविता गायत्री-श्येनारूढो मनस्य् अस्फुरत् - विष्णुर् गरुडे यथा। तदीयो भर्गः सूर्यः। MT’s summary Clestial lights Most believe that he is none other than the Sun of our solar system. Yet, the RV is quite clear about him not being the same as the sun. The sun is merely one manifestation of his activity. In particular, he is specifically linked to the celestial lights, like the rays of the sun (e.
